effect.short: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.

flavorTexts.text:
The user drenches the target in a special poisonous
liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target
is poisoned.
